issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

"Sluggish performance with static table view"

  • We have used static table view in one of the screens under titanium based application
  • When we move onto that screen then sometimes it just doesn't load completely or sometimes some of the rows doesn't appear.
  • When we come on this screen then after a moment all the labels in this table view slid 1px up from its current position - no idea why?

If anybody has any idea about this and some guideline material as how to optimize performance for titanium application when using specific controls etc. then please let us know because for simple/static screens we are facing very slow application performance for now.

Thanks,
DPK

{html}
fields.summary: Sluggish performance with static table view

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed and lack on input for the past 6 years. Any problems, please open a new ticket.
